parameters: \n<Velona>Yeahhh... I should probably check the fridge first.
\n<Velona>I can't just leave this girl alone.
\n<Velona>Still... All things considered, she's in pretty good shape.
Most people would have gotten shredded in a monster pit like that.
\n<Velona>Weird... but that somehow doesn't surprise me.
\n<Velona>First time I've ever seen a mortal with a body like this.
\n<Girl>No no no. I should be dead.
\n<Girl>The bombing, the PEM Underground Base. I could have sworn
everything collapsed on top of me.
\n<Velona>Hold up. I don't know who or what you are
but you probably shouldn't be running around just yet.
Sit down and rest a bit. I'll fix us up something to eat.
Good thing I just did groceries.
\n<Velona>Should be on the shelf next to fridge as usual.
\n<Girl>*Sigh*... I want to visit my parents as soon as possible.
\n<Velona>We can chat after you've eaten something.
For now, just sit here and chill out.
\n<Velona>(So this is the girl huh... that explains how she's
\n<Velona>(Weird. I don't feel any Tricerite energy coming out
of her and she doesn't seem fully "alive" either.
Just what did they do to her...?)
\n<Velona>(Better to not dwell on it for now.)
Thank you Velona, for pulling me out of there.
According to my calculations, you haven't eaten in 20 years.
\n<Kishu>Huh, it really has been 20 years huh.
\n<Kishu>Probably helps that I haven't eaten in a couple decades, haha.
\n<Kishu>Um, do you have any more water?
\n<Velona>Sure, I'll grab you some in a bit.
\n<Velona>When you're done I'll clean up and then we can chat.
\n<Kishu>So... What has happened in the last 20 years...?
\n<Velona>Besides the recent monster outbreak, nothing really.
\n<Kishu>That's a bit of a relief but...
Monster outbreak? Just how bad is it?
\n<Velona>No idea. I just started investigating it today.
\n<Velona>It doesn't seem that bad right now, just some slimes
slithering around the outskirts of Vysio but this is definitely not
\n<Velona>I noticed the barricades near the old PEM base were broken through.
That's how I ended up finding you.
\n<Velona>What were you doing in that basement?
\n<Kishu>It's a bit of a long story... but to sum things up.
\n<Kishu>Before everything collapsed, we were doing tests on my
You don't exactly look like the fighting type.
\n<Kishu>I'm surprised I survived all those explosions.
\n<Kishu>I'm not exactly glad to be alive though...
\n<Velona>I have no idea what you're made of but your body is
Your clothes are in perfect condition too.
\n<Kishu>Huh? Oh yeah. I'm still in my old uniform.
\n<Velona>Whatever technology they used to make you, it is certainly
I've never seen anything like it.
\n<Kishu>Not sure if I should take that as a compliment but
\n<Kishu>Hey, there didn't happen to be any other people like me down
\n<Velona>Sorry to bring bad news but you're the only one I found.
\n<Velona>On top of that, I flipped through some documents around the office.
I was never really friends with anyone when I "worked" there.
\n<Kishu>We all just wanted to fit into society.
None of us would have known that we were stepping into an
\n<Kishu>I just wanted to make my parents proud.
\n<Kishu>Now, I'm not even sure if I can still visit them.
\n<Velona>Hey. You said you're from Kirahaven right?
\n<Velona>I don't normally hang out with people but you can stay
with me while I investigate this monster outbreak.
\n<Velona>I'll help you get to Kirahaven once things quiet down.
Kirahaven is on the opposite side of the island. Even by train it'll
I've been meaning to go there for awhile now anyways. They're
selling a limited edition Yakisoba flavor only availble in Kirahaven.
\n<Velona>It has a special sweet and savory sauce that I just have to try.
\n<Kishu>(Is this girl serious? She is going all the way there
for a package of instant noodles?
Uhh, better just not overthink things and accept her offer.)
\n<Kishu>Wow, thank you. I don't know what to say.
\n<Velona>It's not a big deal. I'm going there anyways.
At least, I think I feel normal. Being "not alive" for so long has
warped my perception of what is and isn't normal.
\n<Velona>(A glass of water and pack of soba later and she seems completely fine.
\n<Velona>In that case, why don't you walk around with me for awhile?
Stretch your legs, get some fresh air, all that good stuff.
\C[01]Kishu\C has been added to the party!
I need to grab some extra stuff before any more
Better head over to the market.
Probably shouldn't mess with Velona's fridge.
... Velona would probably be mad if I messed with
I think I'll take some with me.
\n<Velona>Pour the water in and wait 3 minutes.
I never asked for her name.
Hmm, wait a sec. There's still that Yakisoba from earlier
\n<Velona>Pour the water in and wait 3 minutes.
I never asked for her name.
Hmm, wait a sec. There's still that Yakisoba from earlier
\n<Velona>Hmm... I don't need to read these at the moment.
\n<Velona>Hmm... I don't need to read these at the moment.
Enough to last a few human lifetimes.
\n<Velona>MAN THIS LOOKS TASTY BUT I BETTER CHECK THE DOOR!
\n<Velona>Ah. May as well eat this while no monsters are around.
\n<Velona>Nothing like some yakisoba after a battle.
Crap, I was out so long my soba from earlier got cold.
Better just fridge it and make few fresh packs for now.
\n<Velona>It just isn't the same once it's reheated.
\n<Velona>It just isn't the same once it's reheated.
\n<Velona>It just isn't the same once it's reheated.
\n<Velona>Better talk to that girl and ask for her name.
\n<Velona>I gotta head to the market before I can cook anything.
\n<Velona>Don't need to use this at the moment.
\n<Velona>No... that should be impossible. Nobody has ever managed
\n<Velona>Finished blueprints for a few spells I've been working on.
I don't think this spell will ever come to fruition.
